advisor_messages.message: The association thrives on the dedication of its members. I urge every student to utilize this platform not just for networking, but to truly support one another in your academic and professional journeys.
advisor_messages.name: Dr. Md. Mozammel Hoque

advisor_messages.message: It brings me great joy to see students from Mymensingh excel in SUST. Maintain your integrity, focus on your goals, and always remember your roots as you soar high.
advisor_messages.name: Dr. Ahsan Habib
